articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: Trump meets with top Iran advisers as war threat grows - Axios
articles.description: The Trump administration is closer to a major war in the Middle East than most Americans realize.
articles.content: <ul><li>A U.S. military operation in Iran would likely be a massive, weeks-long campaign that would look more like full-fledged war than last month's pinpoint operation in Venezuela, sources say.</li… [+1701 chars]

articles.author: David Mamet
articles.title: David Mamet: Robert Duvall Was the Best Actor of His Generation - The Free Press
articles.description: David Mamet reflects on Robert Duvall, the late, legendary lead actor of his ‘American Buffalo.’
articles.content: Sixty years ago I was a student at the Neighborhood Playhouse in New York. Sanford Meisner, the head of the school, was, with Lee Strasberg, the co-doyen of something that may have been called The Me… [+417 chars]
